page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A MIDDLE AGED MAN Chris gets up at 6.50am. and has breakfast at 7.30.For breakfast he eats Muesli and two pieces of Ryvita (crisp bread) and one apple.At 8.00 Chris drives his car to work.He wears a jacket or blazer,shirt and tie and trousers. Chris is a county surveyor.He checks that schools are maintained properly.He has a one hour lunch break when he sometimes goes shopping. At 4.55pm. he leaves his office and drives home,often doing the family shopping on the way.At 5.30 he gets home and has a cup of tea. Later he gardens or gets on with our kitchen redecoration.At 7.00 Chris has dinner.After dinner he prepares the packed lunches for the next day, washes up and watches T.V.He goes to bed at 11.00pm.
